trans-unit.source: You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: Afaka segondra vitsy dia ho tafiova any amin'ny pejy fidirana ianao.
Jereo ny boaty e-mailakanao aza fady.

trans-unit.source: A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Misy rohy hamerenana ny tenimiafina nalefa taminao any.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you cannot connect to the back office until you have:
trans-unit.target: Noho ny antony ara-piarovana, tsy afaka miditra amin'ny back office ianao mandrapaha:

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. Please connect using the following link to [1]log in to secure mode (https://)[/1]
trans-unit.target: Mandeha ny SSL. Midira aza fady amin'ny alalan'ito rohy manaraka ito [1] mba hidirana amin'ny fomba voaaro (https://)[/1]

trans-unit.source: The employee does not exist, or the password provided is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Tsy misy ny mpiasa, na koa diso ny tenimiafina nampidirina.

trans-unit.source: This employee does not manage the shop anymore (either the shop has been deleted or permissions have been revoked).
trans-unit.target: Ito mpiasa ito dia tsy afaka mikarakara ny fivarotana intsony (na efa nofafana ny fivarotana na efa voafafa ny fahazoan-dalana amin'izany).

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox. A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Jereo aza fady ny boaty maialakanao. Nisy rohy hamerenana ny tenimiafina lasa any aminao any.
